> <OLD>
>
> Wheelie nodded, "Life can go on.  We can le them know, how things in the
> past can change and go.  To the Autobots in far deep space, they shall not
> have to live in eternal disgrace.  If Megatron shall change the past, can we
> both leave him agahst?  Whatever Hydras here thinks he has, can we not
> escalate for better whereas?  For can we not fight fire wtih fire?  Changing
> the future to our better desire?"
>
> Whispering quietly, "Could we bring Optimus back?  LEt the Cybertronian
> Resistance know hope holds out to cut them some slack?  Is that what we can
> do?  A message sent tot his time to breed hope anew?  It would be so easy,
> it wouldn't even leave us queasy.  Just prop up the Ark's Distress Beacon,
> have it flux and send home a story?  To tell them of it's glory?  By the
> time they got back here, we would be gone and the Ark free and near.  It
> would give us reason to send everyone home, the Decepticons and Predacons
> themselves to toss a bone.  For they could not hold out against and army,
> they would abandon the field as would we."

<NEW>

There was a thoughtful nod from RODIMUS. It looked as if he was going
to say something else when a call came in . . .

(OOC: See the thread: Rise of the Silver Dragon)

He looked back at WHEELIE, "We will have to pick this up later." The
Autobot commander shifted into his vehicular mode. "For the moment I
have a few Mamximals to check on." No, they were not exactly part of
his team, but he flet responsible for them none the less.

(OOC: Feel free to join in or follow if you like)

RODIMUS' wheels spun for a moment as his engine raced and then he sped off!

(TAG)

Preston
